purpose: Facilitates the creation and management of AI agents in a headless integrated development environment
principle: Built on Go, it offers a streamlined environment for AI agent development without a traditional GUI
reusability: Designed to be integrated into existing development workflows with a focus on AI agent orchestration
limitations: Being in alpha, it may lack extensive documentation and community support, and could have limited features compared to full IDEs
